00015 inline bool
00016 is_prime(uint32_t number)
00017 {
00018         if (number == 2) return true;
00019         if (number < 2 || number % 2 == 0) return false;
00020         for (unsigned i(3); i <= std::sqrt(number); ++++i)
00021         {
00022                 if (number % i == 0) return false;
00023         }
00024         return true;
00025 }
00026 
00027 inline uint32_t
00028 next_prime(uint32_t number)
00029 {
00030         while (!is_prime(number)) ++number;
00031         return number;
00032 }

00034 // primary template
00035 template <typename T>
00036 T
00037 hash(const char* key, size_t length);
00038 
00039 template <>
00040 inline uint16_t
00041 hash<uint16_t>(const char* key, size_t length)
00042 {
00043         // Included from /usr/include/c++/4.4/tr1_impl/functional_hash.h
00044         uint16_t result = 0;
00045         for (; length > 0; --length)
00046         {
00047                 result = (result * 131) + *key++;
00048         }
00049         return result;
00050 }
00051 
00052 template <>
00053 inline uint32_t
00054 hash<uint32_t>(const char* key, size_t length)
00055 {
00056         // Included from /usr/include/c++/4.4/tr1_impl/functional_hash.h
00057         uint32_t result = static_cast<uint32_t>(2166136261UL);
00058         for (; length > 0; --length)
00059         {
00060                 result ^= static_cast<uint32_t>(*key++);
00061                 result *= static_cast<uint32_t>(16777619UL);
00062         }
00063         return result;
00064 }
00065 
00066 template <>
00067 inline uint64_t
00068 hash<uint64_t>(const char* key, size_t length)
00069 {
00070         // Included from /usr/include/c++/4.4/tr1_impl/functional_hash.h
00071         uint64_t result = static_cast<uint64_t>(14695981039346656037ULL);
00072         for (; length > 0; --length)
00073         {
00074                 result ^= static_cast<uint64_t>(*key++);
00075                 result *= static_cast<uint64_t>(1099511628211ULL);
00076         }
00077         return result;
00078 }

00080 template <typename T>
00081 T
00082 hash(const std::string& key)
00083 {
00084         return hash<T>(key.c_str(), key.size());
00085 }
